text: Pushpa Raj Pokharel is a Nepalese politician, belonging to the CPN (UML). He is a former Member of Parliament and a former Mayor of Bhadrapur.Local News The Rising Nepal (Daily) ==References== Category:Nepalese mayors Category:Living people Category:Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxistâ€“Leninist) politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Pushpa Raj Pokharel
